page.title: 14 Attitudes
page.content:
We found that the housewives were mainly wives of the farmers, retired, and doctors. For such a small village, it was interesting to note the variety of occupations.At first glance at the map one expects it to be predominantly farming, however this is not so, they are all part of a interesting village with interesting people.
{ATTITUDES _________
On completing this section we were able to determine a considerable amount regarding the attitudes of the people of Swettenham village. Education proved to be a very varied subject.
